verses.verse: וַתִּקְרַ֜בְנָה <WH7126> Then came בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> the daughters צְלָפְחָ֗ד <WH6765> of Zelophehad בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֵ֤פֶר <WH2660> of Hepher בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son גִּלְעָד֙ <WH1568> of Gilead בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מָכִ֣יר <WH4353> of Machir בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> of Manasseh לְמִשְׁפְּחֹ֖ת <WH4940> of the families מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <WH4519> of Manasseh בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> of Joseph וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> and these שְׁמ֣וֹת <WH8034> and these [are] the names בְּנֹתָ֔יו <WH1323> of his daughters מַחְלָ֣ה <WH4244> Mahlah נֹעָ֔ה <WH5270> Noah וְחָגְלָ֥ה <WH2295> and Hoglah וּמִלְכָּ֖ה <WH4435> and Milcah וְתִרְצָֽה׃ <WH8656> and Tirzah

וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֜דְנָה <WH5975> And they stood לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> Moses וְלִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> and before אֶלְעָזָ֣ר <WH499> Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest וְלִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> and before הַנְּשִׂיאִ֖ם <WH5387> the princes וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעֵדָ֑ה <WH5712> and all the congregation פֶּ֥תַח <WH6607> [by] the door אֹֽהֶל־ <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> of the congregation לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אָבִינוּ֮ <WH1> Our father מֵ֣ת <WH4191> died בַּמִּדְבָּר֒ <WH4057> in the wilderness וְה֨וּא <WH1931> he לֹא־ <WH3808> no הָיָ֜ה <WH1961> had בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> and he was not in הָעֵדָ֗ה <WH5712> the company הַנּוֹעָדִ֛ים <WH3259> of them that gathered themselves together עַל־ <WH5921> against יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> against the LORD בַּעֲדַת־ <WH5712> in the company קֹ֑רַח <WH7141> of Korah כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בְחֶטְא֣וֹ <WH2399> in his own sin מֵ֔ת <WH4191> but died וּבָנִ֖ים <WH1121> and had no sons לֹא־ <WH3808> no הָ֥יוּ <WH1961> had לֽוֹ׃

לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Why יִגָּרַ֤ע <WH1639> be done away שֵׁם־ <WH8034> Why should the name אָבִ֙ינוּ֙ <WH1> of our father מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> from among מִשְׁפַּחְתּ֔וֹ <WH4940> his family כִּ֛י <WH3588> because אֵ֥ין <WH369> had ל֖וֹ בֵּ֑ן <WH1121> afflicted תְּנָה־ <WH5414> add לָּ֣נוּ אֲחֻזָּ֔ה <WH272> unto us [therefore] a possession בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> among אֲחֵ֥י <WH251> the brethren אָבִֽינוּ׃ <WH1> of our father
;וַיַּקְרֵ֥ב <WH7126> brought מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפָּטָ֖ן <WH4941> their cause לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> right בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> The daughters צְלָפְחָד֮ <WH6765> of Zelophehad דֹּבְרֹת֒ <WH1696> speak נָתֹ֨ן <WH5414> thou shalt surely תִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> give לָהֶם֙ אֲחֻזַּ֣ת <WH272> them a possession נַחֲלָ֔ה <WH5159> of an inheritance בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> among אֲחֵ֣י <WH251> brethren אֲבִיהֶ֑ם <WH1> their father's וְהַֽעֲבַרְתָּ֛ <WH5674> to pass אֶת־ <WH853> נַחֲלַ֥ת <WH5159> and thou shalt cause the inheritance אֲבִיהֶ֖ן <WH1> of their father לָהֶֽן׃

וְאֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel תְּדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> And thou shalt speak לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> If a man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יָמ֗וּת <WH4191> die וּבֵן֙ <WH1121> and have no son אֵ֣ין <WH369> and has ל֔וֹ וְהַֽעֲבַרְתֶּ֥ם <WH5674> to pass אֶת־ <WH853> נַחֲלָת֖וֹ <WH5159> then ye shall cause his inheritance לְבִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH1323> unto his daughter

וְאִם־ <WH518> If אֵ֥ין <WH369> has ל֖וֹ בַּ֑ת <WH1323> And if he have no daughter וּנְתַתֶּ֥ם <WH5414> then ye shall give אֶת־ <WH853> נַחֲלָת֖וֹ <WH5159> his inheritance לְאֶחָיו׃ <WH251> unto his brethren

וְאִם־ <WH518> If אֵ֥ין <WH369> has ל֖וֹ אַחִ֑ים <WH251> And if he have no brethren וּנְתַתֶּ֥ם <WH5414> then ye shall give אֶת־ <WH853> נַחֲלָת֖וֹ <WH5159> his inheritance לַאֲחֵ֥י <WH251> brethren אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> unto his father's

וְאִם־ <WH518> If אֵ֣ין <WH369> has אַחִים֮ <WH251> have no brethren לְאָבִיו֒ <WH1> And if his father וּנְתַתֶּ֣ם <WH5414> then ye shall give אֶת־ <WH853> נַחֲלָת֗וֹ <WH5159> his inheritance לִשְׁאֵר֞וֹ <WH7607> unto his kinsman הַקָּרֹ֥ב <WH7138> that is next אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> in מִמִּשְׁפַּחְתּ֖וֹ <WH4940> to him of his family וְיָרַ֣שׁ <WH3423> and he shall possess אֹתָ֑הּ <WH853> וְֽהָ֨יְתָ֜ה <WH1961> become לִבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> it and it shall be unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel לְחֻקַּ֣ת <WH2708> a statute מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> of judgment כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses עֲלֵ֛ה <WH5927> Get thee up אֶל־ <WH413> about הַ֥ר <WH2022> into this mount הָעֲבָרִ֖ים <WH5682> Abarim הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> to this וּרְאֵה֙ <WH7200> and see אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> which I have given לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְרָאִ֣יתָה <WH7200> And when thou hast seen אֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> וְנֶאֱסַפְתָּ֥ <WH622> it thou also shalt be gathered אֶל־ <WH413> to עַמֶּ֖יךָ <WH5971> unto thy people גַּם־ <WH1571> too אָ֑תָּה <WH859> you כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after נֶאֱסַ֖ף <WH622> was gathered אַהֲרֹ֥ן <WH175> as Aaron אָחִֽיךָ׃ <WH251> thy brother

כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> you מְרִיתֶ֨ם <WH4784> For ye rebelled פִּ֜י <WH6310> against my commandment בְּמִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> in the desert צִ֗ן <WH6790> of Zin בִּמְרִיבַת֙ <WH4808> in the strife הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> of the congregation לְהַקְדִּישֵׁ֥נִי <WH6942> to sanctify בַמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> me at the water לְעֵינֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5869> before their eyes הֵ֛ם <WH1992> מֵֽי־ <WH4325> that [is] the water מְרִיבַ֥ת <WH4809> of Meribah קָדֵ֖שׁ <WH6946> in Kadesh מִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> in the wilderness צִֽן׃ <WH6790> of Zin פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

יִפְקֹ֣ד <WH6485> set יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Let the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> the God הָרוּחֹ֖ת <WH7307> of the spirits לְכָל־ <WH3605> of all בָּשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> of all flesh אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> a man עַל־ <WH5921> over הָעֵדָֽה׃ <WH5712> over the congregation

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יֵצֵ֣א <WH3318> Which may go out לִפְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH6440> before וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> and who יָבֹא֙ <WH935> them and which may go in לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> before וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יוֹצִיאֵ֖ם <WH3318> them and which may lead them out וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who יְבִיאֵ֑ם <WH935> and which may bring them in וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not תִהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> become עֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> that the congregation יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD כַּצֹּ֕אן <WH6629> be not as sheep אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who אֵין־ <WH369> have לָהֶ֖ם רֹעֶֽה׃ <WH7462> which have no shepherd

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses קַח־ <WH3947> Take לְךָ֙ אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> thee Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נ֔וּן <WH5126> of Nun אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> a man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> in whom [is] the spirit בּ֑וֹ וְסָמַכְתָּ֥ <WH5564> and lay אֶת־ <WH853> יָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> thine hand עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

וְהַֽעֲמַדְתָּ֣ <WH5975> And set אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> him before אֶלְעָזָ֣ר <WH499> Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest וְלִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> and before כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעֵדָ֑ה <WH5712> all the congregation וְצִוִּיתָ֥ה <WH6680> and give him a charge אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5869> in their sight

וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <WH5414> And thou shalt put מֵהֽוֹדְךָ֖ <WH1935> [some] of thine honour עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> on לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> order יִשְׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> may be obedient כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲדַ֖ת <WH5712> upon him that all the congregation בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְלִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> before אֶלְעָזָ֤ר <WH499> Eleazar הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> the priest יַעֲמֹ֔ד <WH5975> And he shall stand וְשָׁ֥אַל <WH7592> who shall ask ל֛וֹ בְּמִשְׁפַּ֥ט <WH4941> [counsel] for him after the judgment הָאוּרִ֖ים <WH224> of Urim לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> At פִּ֨יו <WH6310> at his word יֵצְא֜וּ <WH3318> shall they go out וְעַל־ <WH5921> out פִּ֣יו <WH6310> and at his word יָבֹ֗אוּ <WH935> they shall come in ה֛וּא <WH1931> he וְכָל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> [both] he and all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> of Israel אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> even וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעֵדָֽה׃ <WH5712> with him even all the congregation

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> did מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> him and he took אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <WH3091> Joshua וַיַּֽעֲמִדֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH5975> and set לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> him before אֶלְעָזָ֣ר <WH499> Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest וְלִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> and before כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעֵדָֽה׃ <WH5712> all the congregation

וַיִּסְמֹ֧ךְ <WH5564> And he laid אֶת־ <WH853> יָדָ֛יו <WH3027> his hands עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> on וַיְצַוֵּ֑הוּ <WH6680> upon him and gave him a charge כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> of Moses פ
